quest.name: Doggone Dagons
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Nemshs Ooan could use a helping hand with a necessary evil.

dialogue.name: NEMSHSOOAN
dialogue.text: Greetings, honored guessst. Could you perchance lend an old Ondo a hand with a troublesome hunt?

dialogue.name: NEMSHSOOAN
dialogue.text: Dagons pose a threat to the young and infirm, for they disguise themselves as rocks and ambush their prey to feed. They must be culled for the good of all, but I alone cannot see this done.

dialogue.name: NEMSHSOOAN
dialogue.text: Therefore I would ask you to help me in ssslaying the meddlesome pests. A trio should sssuffice. Come and see me when you have finished.

dialogue.name: NEMSHSOOAN
dialogue.text: You need not slay ten ssscore or some other ungodly amount, my friend. Three dagons alone would be a tremendous help.

dialogue.name: NEMSHSOOAN
dialogue.text: Say no more, honored guest. The dagons are dead. I can smell their blood on you.

dialogue.name: NEMSHSOOAN
dialogue.text: Like the Ondo, they too seek to take shhhelter in the ancient ruins. It is a regrettable state of affairs that we must ever ssstrive to keep their numbers in check, else they drive us out of hearth and home.

dialogue.name: NEMSHSOOAN
dialogue.text: It will only be more difficult to do so in the absence of water...but such is our life now. There is naught to be gained from pining for what was lossst...
